main event: A civilian reported observing a metallic object resembling a large silver disk flying at an estimated altitude of 30,000 feet and tremendous speed while onboard an airplane near Agoura, California on December 28, 1953.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 15 minutes,The object was estimated to be 40 to 50 feet in diameter and made no sound or left no trail,Two smaller objects were observed flying in close proximity to the main object,Another observer on the ground saw the same object at the same time,The object was described as metallic in nature and flying at around 15,000 mph.
sighted object: a large silver disk or saucer-shaped craft
witness description: A civilian pilot and a passenger in the Lockheed LT-2 airplane.
